InteractionConfig
[System.Serializable]
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​Configuration.​InteractionConfig

This class is a container for all of the settings related to the interactions being processed by the TouchFree Service. The settings at the root of this object will affect all sensations. There are also some settings specific to the Hover and Hold interaction which can be modified by changing the contained HoverAndHoldInteractionSettings.

In order to modify the settings of the service, create an instance of this class, make the changes you wish to see, and then send it to the server using the ConfigurationManager.

Like all of the Settings classes found in this file, all members are optional. If you do not modify a member of this class, its value will not change when the instance is sent to TouchFree Service.

Properties
useScrollingOrDragging
public bool useScrollingOrDragging { get; set }

If true, allows interactions to send up/down events seperately, enabling dragging or touchscreen-like scrolling behaviours. If false, up/down events will be sent together, and every down will function like a click of its own.

deadzoneRadius
public float deadzoneRadius { get; set }

All interactions use a small deadzone to stabilise the position of the cursor, to prevent small user movements from making the cursor shake in place. This setting controls the radius of that deadzone.

interactionZoneEnabled
public bool interactionZoneEnabled { get; set }

Changes whether the Interaction Zone values will be used

interactionMinDistanceCm
public float interactionMinDistanceCm { get; set }

The minimum distance from the screen that users can interact within

interactionMaxDistanceCm
public float interactionMaxDistanceCm { get; set }

The maximum distance from the screen that users can interact within

interactionType
public InteractionType interactionType { get; set }

This represents the type of interaction currently selected

Variables
HoverAndHold
public HoverAndHoldInteractionSettings HoverAndHold
TouchPlane
public TouchPlaneInteractionSettings TouchPlane
configValues
public Dictionary<string, object> configValues

This dictionary is used to store the edited members only, and is accessed when serializing the data for transfer to the Service.

DO NOT MODIFY THIS DICTIONARY MANUALLY

UseScrollingOrDragging
[SerializeField]
private bool UseScrollingOrDragging
DeadzoneRadius
[SerializeField]
private float DeadzoneRadius
InteractionZoneEnabled
[SerializeField]
private bool InteractionZoneEnabled
InteractionMinDistanceCm
[SerializeField]
private float InteractionMinDistanceCm
InteractionMaxDistanceCm
[SerializeField]
private float InteractionMaxDistanceCm
InteractionType
[SerializeField]
